snippet: “Courageous” is about a Georgia police officer whose job exposes him to social decay and spiritual desolation wrought by fatherless homes, strengthening his devotion to conservative family values.
lead_paragraph: “Courageous” is about a Georgia police officer whose job exposes him to social decay and spiritual desolation wrought by fatherless homes, strengthening his devotion to conservative family values.

headline.main: Fathers Who Tend to Their Flocks
